name: The floor is ice
description:
Attempt at a local coop game up to 4 players.

The object of the game is to throw a ball at other players to stun them or to destroy the ground on which they are standing by throwing a ball on it.

Random icicles spawn in the level destroying the floor adding an extra challenge.

Many bugs persist and we ran out of time.
